context: Hi! What is your favourite movie?
I really like war movies like Darkest Hour (2017)
Me too! Have you seen Dunkirk (2017) ? I haven't seen the original yet though.
yes, and I loved it! I also really like The Hurt Locker (2008)
I've not seen that one. I'll check it out. I can recommend some old school movies too... have you seen Ice Cold in Alex (1958) ? Or Escape to Victory (1981) ?
I haven't seen that one or that one either. I will put them on my list. I want to see 12 Strong (2018)
resp: Yes that one looks interesting. I also like things like Inglourious Basterds (2009)

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?
I'm looking for a movie that's funny and entertaining, emotional and thought-provoking, and heartwarming and wholesome for the family. Do you have any recommendations in mind?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to discover new movies and get some awesome recommendations! I can't wait to find a humorous and entertaining flick, an emotional and thought-provoking drama, and a heartwarming and wholesome family movie. Let's see what the recommender suggests!

context.content: I recommend "Enchanted (2007)" for its humor, entertainment, emotional moments, and heartwarming family-friendly story.
That sounds awesome! Can you tell me more about "Enchanted (2007)"?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to explore "Enchanted (2007)"! It sounds like it has the perfect mix of humor, emotion, and family-friendly warmth. I can't wait to find out more about it.

context.content: "Enchanted (2007)" is a delightful mix of live-action and animation, following a fairytale princess who is transported to modern-day New York City. It's filled with humor, heartwarming moments, and a charming story that the whole family can enjoy.

Wow, "Enchanted (2007)" sounds amazing! I love the idea of a fairytale princess in modern-day New York City. It seems to have everything I'm looking for in a movie. I'm so excited to watch it with my family. I'll definitely accept this recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I love the idea of a fairytale princess in modern-day New York City! It sounds like "Enchanted (2007)" has the perfect mix of humor, heartwarming moments, and family-friendly story. I can't wait to watch it with my family. This recommender really understands what I'm looking for in a movie. I'm so excited to accept this recommendation! [END]
